mapper.select: select g.*, min(sku.sell_price) as sell_price, sku.original_price from t_goods g right join t_goods_sku sku on g.id = sku.goods_id left join t_shop s on g.shop_id = s.id where g.store_id = #{storeId} and g.goods_class_id like concat('%', #{goodsClassId}, '%') and g.status = '2' and g.shop_status = '2' and g.delete_status = '0' and g.active = '1' and s.is_open = '1' group by sku.goods_id order by g.create_time, g.sort desc limit 10

select g.*, min(sku.sell_price) as sell_price, sku.original_price from t_goods g right join t_goods_sku sku on g.id = sku.goods_id left join t_shop s on g.shop_id = s.id where g.store_id = #{storeId} and g.status = '2' and g.shop_status = '2' and g.delete_status = '0' and g.active = '1' and s.is_open = '1' and g.show_address like '%1%' group by sku.goods_id order by g.create_time, g.sort desc

select min(cast(sell_price as decimal(12,2))) as minSellPrice, max(cast(sell_price as decimal(12,2))) as maxSellPrice, min(cast(original_price as decimal(12,2))) as minOriginalPrice, max(cast(original_price as decimal(12,2))) as maxOriginalPrice from t_goods_sku where goods_id = #{goodsId}
